summary: Completed comprehensive testing of EcoTrack carbon footprint calculator app. All critical features are working correctly including user authentication, activity logging, carbon calculations, dashboard statistics, and data visualization. Backend APIs are robust with proper JWT authentication and accurate carbon footprint calculations using predefined emission factors. Frontend provides smooth user experience with working forms, navigation, and Chart.js integration.

minor_issues.issue: Console warnings about 'Filler' plugin not being enabled
minor_issues.impact: No functional impact, just console warnings
minor_issues.details: Chart.js shows warnings about missing Filler plugin but charts render correctly

passed_tests: User login authentication with JWT tokens
Transportation activity logging for all transport types (car, bus, train, flight, walking, cycling)
Carbon footprint calculation accuracy with correct emission factors
Dashboard stats display (total emissions: 18.013 kg, total activities: 10, daily average, monthly totals)
Activity history viewing with proper formatting and CO2 badges
Chart data API endpoints for daily/weekly/monthly periods
JWT token authentication flow and security
Navigation between dashboard tabs (Dashboard, Add Activity, History)
Logout functionality returning to landing page
Landing page UI with feature cards and call-to-action buttons
Auth modal with login/signup toggle functionality
Activity form with transport type selection, distance input, date picker
Chart visualization with period selection (Daily, Weekly, Monthly)
Protected endpoint security (401/403 for unauthorized access)
Invalid login rejection with proper error messages
action_item_for_main_agent: No critical issues found. App is production-ready. Optional improvement: Add Chart.js Filler plugin to eliminate console warnings during chart rendering.
